website_summaries.verdict: This is a powerful and effective single-serve blender that won't cost a fortune, just don't expect it to go too far beyond the line of duty.
pros: Despite its small size, the Nutri Ninja competes with high-end blenders when doing the basics
The streamlined design makes it easy to use and clean
cons: It has the power to do more, but the single-serve-only setup and difficulty with dry foods prevent it from being an effective multitasker

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender! I use it daily and great results. I sometimes wish I would have gone for the larger blender with 64 or 72 oz cups because I use this for meal replacing smoothies, but I am still very satisfied. One of my blades some how got bent one month after I bought it. Customer service woman with nutri ninja was very friendly and apologetic for the occurrence, and eager to fix the problem (1 year manufacturer warranty). So they sent me a new blade free of charge. Very pleased! Would definitely recommend the blender and the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Newman

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Drink Maker Start to Finish
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with his purchase. Makes an excellent drink in under one minute. The texture is not like a juicer, it is more like a smoothie. I had a traditional juicer so when I used this I did have to adjust the recipes adding liquid such as almond milk, coconut water, ice water, etc. Once I figured out those minor adjustments, I have used this every day as opposed to mainly weekend use of a traditional juicer which requires much more cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed with quality materials . . . feels like it will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: I did some research comparing with Magic Bullet and decided on this Ninja Pro 900 watt. I like it a lot. No complaints. It grinds up block ice cubes no sweat. Doesn't leak unless I overfill it, which is my bad. Even then, it only leaks a little. Good value for the money. I bought the extended warranty, but after using it for several weeks, it seems well-designed with quality materials, so I might not ever use the warranty. After reading other reviews, I concluded that any blender used frequently would break sooner than later. This Ninja might prove me wrong. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dashuang

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, I thought the people saying it leaked were using it wrong, so I bought it. Well, it leaks. And due to the nature of where the blender attaches to the base, it is a nightmare to clean. So it's a glorified coffee bean grinder in my house. Customer support emailed me once and never did anything about it. Ninja support, not Amazon. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Mason

customer_reviews.title: Powerful personal blender
customer_reviews.text: Pretty amazing personal blender. This thing is 900w of power. You barely need to chop finely- in fact, you don't. It handles chunks just fine. And the thing could not be easier to use. Don't go over the Fill line, or the cap with the blades won't screw on correctly, and the product won't work. I make smoothies with soy or almond milk and fruits. I also juice with filtered water. Whatever your preference. Kale is a good green to use, as is Dandelion. You can sneak in things that are healthy like Cauliflower, because they have no taste. One note: citrus fruits are not good to use. For some reason, they become bitter in the blender.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Worth spending extra.
customer_reviews.text: I go through my smoothie use spurts. Right now I'm off, but when I was I was using this every day and unlike past blenders, this one never burnt out on me. I do try to be gentle and let my frozen fruit thaw for some time before blending, but this seems to be more durable to the frozen fruit than others. I say spend the extra money and get this instead of buying cheaper ones over and over. Please note, I've only used this for smoothies. Not soups, creams, or anything else.
customer_reviews.author: #BuyerBeware

customer_reviews.title: easy and fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of review research on similar products and finally settled on this one.it's been fantastic...I bought it for my dad seven months ago to replace his horribly expensive juicer that took him longer to clean than juice...he gave up on the juicer and it sits in the cupboard...in my quest to get him making healthier choices I tried this product...he loves it and now I use it just as much...super easy to use and clean...definitely get additional cups and bigger ones..this was so worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth hunter

customer_reviews.title: But as for being able to do what it's supposed to do it has worked wonderfully. I make myself smoothies for breakfast and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Well as this is a recent purchase I can't speak to how long it's going to actually last. But as for being able to do what it's supposed to do it has worked wonderfully. I make myself smoothies for breakfast and it blends them beautifully right down to being able to blend ice. I get a nice smooth smoothie! The only thing I'll say is it is super crazy loud, I mean I expected a blender to be loud but it still caught me off guard.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Mcbunny

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to get
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely happy I went with this version. There's alot to be said for being able to blend and then consume in the same container. It makes for ease of use and fast cleanup that makes this so convenient. The power is all there and the large cup does a large serving or 2 small-med servings. I've not had any issues and would only say to tighten lid completely b4 blending so there is no leakage. I've not had a leakage problem but if lid is not tight it can vibrate just enough during heavy blending to loosen the lid. This takes up hardly any counter space - it's a win win all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Nutri Ninja
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Nutri Ninja Pro to make smoothies after seeing commercials for the product. I'm very pleased with is so far. This is an awesome product. It was easy to setup and use. I've made several smoothies since I received it and really like the way the smoothies come out. This blender/processor really turns your fruit and whatever else you decide to put into your smoothies into a cold smooth luscious smoothie. It pulverizes the fruit and ice into a really smooth drink in only about a minute or less. Since I'd never used or purchased a ninja product before I though I'd start with this one and I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie 68

customer_reviews.title: Blends everything well
customer_reviews.text: This blender works amazingly well - blends fruit, vegetables, nuts, ice, everything to a fine smooth consistency in seconds. Very simple and easy to use. As the instructions clearly state, do not fill past the line before blending and you shouldn't have any leaking problems. Be sure to screw the lids on tightly before blending or drinking from the cups. I have to agree with another reviewer: having the threads on the inside is not the greatest because there's smoothie in the threads after you blend it but before you screw the drinking lid on. Not wild about having to wipe out the threads every time.
customer_reviews.author: inkling

customer_reviews.title: No more expensive juice stores!!!
customer_reviews.text: Professional quality. It's like I have my own mini juice/smoothie store in my kitchen! This thing pummel ice and turns it into soft pillowy goodness! Don't get the $30 or $40 products that have the here and there not so good reviews. This is worth paying more than the $80 for, especially if you're making fresh food juices and smoothies. I even use it for my protein powder shakes in the morning. 30 seconds and done! For just about everything. Very impressed. I skipped the bullet and the vitamix (havingbut ed both)for this one, and this performs better for waaay less money.
customer_reviews.author: Sideshow 535

customer_reviews.title: Great for busy people
customer_reviews.text: Make great smoothie in just 60 seconds or so. This is great because even if I'm running late to work I still have time to blend up something before heading out the door. Also, even if your fruit and vegetable are not cut very small, this nutria ninja will chop right through and leave you with a silky smooth finish (keep in mind, the larger the chucks, the longer you have to blend). I do wish it came with 2 more cups; I would totally be willing to pay extra for that. All in all a good purchase. My sister ordered one last week because of how awesome I said it was.
customer_reviews.author: K.Lee

customer_reviews.title: LOUD but it works! (Space Saver)
customer_reviews.text: Broken blender=new gadget tryout. I could not wait to try the craze of the Ninja. This thing blends so fast but I will tell you that you almost need hearing protection for how LOUD it is. Once you get adjusted to the sound, it is not so bad. We make shakes every morning and this little guy has been impressive. Also, when it comes to space, it is quite refreshing. It is not obnoxious and bulky but fits nicely on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: StellarCShine

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Lids are horrible. Cups warp in dishwasher. Prefer nutri bullet. This unit smells like it will blow up or smoke when using. The lids are difficult to screw on to cups. Dont recommend this product. I use mine daily to make protein shakes. Spend more money for a better unit.
customer_reviews.author: Lew Perna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This little baby does it all & does it quickly! Easy to use, easy to clean. The two different size canisters are great for large or small amounts. Great motor & blade, can easily chop up veggies, fruits, and ice, and does not leave large chunks behind. It will pulverize whatever you throw in - just make sure you have enough liquid as with all blenders. I have a large Ninja blender & wanted something small for quick smoothies/drinks. I already love the Ninja products because they are powerful and easy to use. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: tmato_mama

customer_reviews.title: There is a really big design flaw to this blender ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a really big design flaw to this blender. Besides the difficulty to screw the blades on which other reviewers have thoroughly described, the washer is badly designed. The purpose of the washer is to prevent any leaks when blending, however it is nearly impossible to clean the blades. If you don't take the washer out and clean it, food will get stuck and after a few blends and there will be a really big stink coming from the blades. Mold will soon start to develop. However, getting the washer out to clean after every use is nearly impossible. Stay away from this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Salvatore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of power, easy to use, priced just fine. This thing takes care of business for me. I make protein fruit smoothies with: frozen strawberries, bananas, blueberries, then a scoop of peanut butter, a shot of honey, 2 scoops of protein powder, and some unsweetened almond milk. It handles this just great, and my breakfast shakes are delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Scott B

customer_reviews.title: Blends nicely. With just a little push it blends everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Blends nicely. With just a little push it blends everything so smoothly. Kind of loud, but to be expected with a blender. My kids love making a smoothie every morning. Easy clean up and no hassle with anything really. We love our Ninja.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life changer!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this thing every single day for months. Probably one of the best purchases I've ever made. Honestly this thing has changed my life. I put kale spinach frozen fruit protein powder hemp seeds and some and some Almond milk, and bam, breakfast! I used to never eat breakfast, as food is not appealing to me in the morning. I love this damn thing and I don't know what I'd do without it! Blends everything fast and to perfection. No leaves left, or seeds. Ninja is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Finally Using and Enjoying my Nutri Ninja Pro (BL450)
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to trying the Nutri Ninja Pro after buying it nearly a year ago; it has sat undisturbed in its box the entire time. Well, the first time I tried it, it didn't leak, but the 2nd and 3rd time it did. I tried it two more times, being especially careful in the cleaning and reassembling, and no leaks! I am going to watch carefully with this unit. I do hope it continues to work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Liz FlaglerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Ninja BLAST
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I can't believe how powerful this product is. It takes only seconds to blend a drink together. Just be careful not to blend too long. I've made smoothies with frozen fruit and ice and it mixed in no time to a nice consistency. And of course just take the blades off and put the lid on and you are on your way. I put my blender out in the pantry and haven't used it since.
customer_reviews.author: L J

customer_reviews.title: Yum, my healthy shake is on its way!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I did not like the blender. It appeared to leak and was a little troublesome to use - but only at certain moments. Now, despite how easy it was to begin with, I have determined the proper way of screwing the lid on making the operation of the device seamless. I have found healthy happiness at last! So, if your unit is giving you frustrations, be sure to use it a few more times before you pass it on for another device. My one remaining concern is cleaning. The dicing and cutting portion of the blender do not seam easily detachable. I will be sure to update this review this causes some disappointment. Otherwise, happy blending to all!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah S

customer_reviews.title: and juice inside of my Nutri Ninja and about a minute later I have an amazing smoothie. I cannot recommend this product enough
customer_reviews.text: I use my Nutri Ninja Pro everyday! I have made sauces, soups, and smoothies. I will never use canned tomato sauce again, because of how effectively my Nutri Ninja crushes and blends tomatoes and other ingredients. When I make my smoothies I directly place frozen fruit, yogurt, and juice inside of my Nutri Ninja and about a minute later I have an amazing smoothie. I cannot recommend this product enough. I constantly tell friends and family that they need one!
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect. Not only did it not take up too ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a Vitamix owner and wanted something smaller for my smaller place of residents. This was perfect. Not only did it not take up too much space but it was very powerful. I have made Smoothies, Juices, Salad Dressings, Frozen cocktails and Purees already. The clean up is very easy,There is a recipe booklet for those who are just getting started also.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine O

customer_reviews.title: Love love love my ninja
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my ninja. I use my ninja EVERY SINGLE DAY. I use it in the morning for my coffee (yes coffee) I put my coffee in the blender with natural honey, coconut oil, hazelnut extract and a dash of cinnamon. It blends it so perfectly and makes it nice and frothy. I also use it for making smoothies and protein shakes. Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: RACHEL

customer_reviews.title: I never review items, but I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for maybe 3 months and I do not use it every week. I finally decided to buy a frozen smoothie mix from the store. I added blended water & spinach to the smoothie mix (small frozen peaches & yogurt) and the metal blade broke!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Best for ice drinks
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the Ninja. I had a Magic Bullet, that I use daily for protein shakes and have gone through 2 bases. I did read that the Ninja is the only product specifically designed to crush ice without damaging the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh A.

customer_reviews.title: Bought the Ninja Professional blender and loved it so purchased this smaller one for our lake ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Ninja Professional blender and loved it so purchased this smaller one for our lake house since it was just one small piece versus the blender and large base. I LOVE it... it makes smoothies just as well as the larger blender and I actually like the larger cup size. favorite recipe: 2 cups spinach, peanut butter powder, frozen banana and almond milk. It tastes like a Reeses peanut butter cup - no spinach taste at all (and I hate spinach) ! easy clean up too!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget T

customer_reviews.title: Just buy this one and you won't regret it one minute
customer_reviews.text: The Ninja Pro is the best blender ever!! If you are weighing out the competitor to this one,,don't! This blender is of high quality materials, blends very fast, very powerful, and never leaves clumps or chunks in your smoothie. Fantastic product! I use it everyday making healthy fresh fruit/vegetable smoothies. My advice to Ninja,,,,never change! Keep making great produces of this quality. p,s,,,,i had to buy my mother one for mothers day too.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Love the Nutra Ninja!
customer_reviews.text: One of my best purchases. Works like a charm, and easy to use and clean. I have used it multiple times per week for a few months for turning frozen fruit chunks into healthy drinks, with or without added protein. Well worth the extra money over the inexpensive machine I bought that always smelled like it was burning up, and died after a several months.
customer_reviews.author: E. Crum

customer_reviews.title: Ninja customer service is lacking.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this product. From the beginning the motor smelled like something electrical was burning every time it ran for more than quick pulse. It did not go away so I finally called Ninja customer service. They said they would replace it, but when I finally got the paperwork from them it stated they could replace it with a refurbished unit. A phone call to them confirmed this policy. Not acceptable I said. So....I am returning the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Siri Foster

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping to make juice - like from apples and carrots
customer_reviews.text: It's a powerful blender. I was hoping to make juice - like from apples and carrots, but it is not good for that. Smoothies are OK. But as a blender, it's very convenient for small batch things like sauces and salad dressings - hummus, pesto, etc. Easy to clean. I found the sipping lids hard to get on because they have an external thread, and any substance inside the cups make them hard to screw on.
customer_reviews.author: Mommer

customer_reviews.title: WAAY TOO LOUUUUd
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good and powerful blender that appears able to cope with most jobs. Unfortunately this is REALLY LOUD. Put it on in the downstaris kitchen and my son in family room could not hear his movies. in fact the blender could be heard all over the house. I'd bought as a gift for my wife for sounds when she works out, but it has proven too unreliable as the ride involves several "not-nice" neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: wattsie

customer_reviews.title: so far so good I do like this better then the bullet brand
customer_reviews.text: so far so good I do like this better then the bullet brand, this one you have to hold the cup down as it does not lock into place which is not a big deal but I am short and it is a struggle to hold it down but with its power and the ability to grind up my frozen fruit I will not trade it in for the other brand I own two of them and kept burning thru them trying to blend frozen fruit.
customer_reviews.author: BellaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product!!! I would recommend to anyone who likes fresh fruit smoothies or mikshakes or whatever else this thing makes. I have had it a month or two now and I love it a thousand times more than the behemoth vitamix that was more than 3 times as much!! You can quickly and easily make an individual smoothie or milkshake and throw the lid on and be good to go. When your done, the cups are dishwasher safe. Best thing I have ever purchased!!
customer_reviews.author: Alie Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love my Nutri Ninja. I was leery that It would not work as advertised and I would have wasted my money. However, I am happy to say it is wonderful. I was undecided whether to get this one or the Auto IQ and chose this one because it was less expensive. Glad I made the right decision. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Love this Ninja
customer_reviews.text: Very well made little machine, and it really does outdo the Nutri Bullet just as several customers mentioned! I have had my Nija for about a month. It is solidly made, the price is lower than the Nutri Bullet, is so easy to use, and it does a FINE job!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: I love this products. Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I hadn't waited so long to try Green drinks. They are sooo easy to make and you do not have to have any culinary skills to make them in one minute. This product is amazing and it is so fun. I keep looking for vegetables and fruits to throw in. It is powerful, easy to operate, easy to clean. I just love it and recommend anyone on the fence to try this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jersey Shore

customer_reviews.title: ... YouTube and found that the nutra ninja was a better product so I purchased it I sure am glad ...
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research looked at YouTube and found that the nutra ninja was a better product so I purchased it I sure am glad that I did out of the box this thing made amazing spinach kale green apple and orange juice. I bought a $400 omega juicer and that thing takes forever to clean up afterwards not to mention all the food prep (and it sits in the cupboard) this nutra ninja takes one minute to clean so at this point I am extremely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: mark s johnson

customer_reviews.title: it is so great! " So there you have it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 2 months. Each time I use it I have thought to myself, " I have to write a review of this, it is so great!" So there you have it. I have never bought anything that I liked so well that I felt I needed to leave a review. This is so handy and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Rand Al Thor

customer_reviews.title: Surprised me how well it worked.
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted one for Valentines. She really loves it, and I thought this thing just looks like a blender. Our blenders look fancy but dont blend all that good. Dang, fired this thing up, and all about the fluid dynamics I guess, because this blended amazingly. She likes making drinks, salsa, salad dressings, and whatever else. We did some searching online amongst similar blenders and this one seemed to be about the best. Hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Works great but with faulty attachment
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in October last year and the smaller cup was being used for smoothies at times. Whips and blends everything in a jiffy. I recently started using the bigger cup only to realize that it slips from the mixer blade attachment while running thereby spilling contents. It has been used only thrice, so I am assuming that there was some problem with the attachment rather than wearing out issue. Though it is covered under warranty for an year, the cost is attachment is lesser than the fee I am supposed to pay for the replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Nipun Sehrawat

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love, love
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love, love, love it. Word of caution though, it is loud. But it juices anything, its amazing. I chop up my veggies and fruit into big chunks and they are all juiced up. I actually use it now to grind oats that use and substitute for flour in some of my recipes. so its not only a juicer for me, its more versatile.
customer_reviews.author: loveshoes

customer_reviews.title: Powerful And A Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought the BL450 to replace an aging Nutra Bullit my wife uses for her smoothies. It gets used about twice a day and is much more powerful than the retired Nutra Bullit. We also have a full size Vitamix but my wife likes the smaller mixer for smoothies and Nutra Ninja Pro does a great job and is easy to clean. Seems like a great value but only time will tell if it proves reliable. Happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: jaldeborgh

customer_reviews.title: We started with the Magic Bullet 2 years ago which was wonderful and still works very well and graduated to the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the grown ups version for smoothie making. We started with the Magic Bullet 2 years ago which was wonderful and still works very well and graduated to the Nutri Ninja. This powerful machine blows the doors off. It is solid construction, powerful enough to puree most foods and well designed. I would reccommend this product to anyone who grooves on smoothies like we do.
customer_reviews.author: HughMann

customer_reviews.title: Glad I picked this up after doing an exhausting amount ...
customer_reviews.text: Glad I picked this up after doing an exhausting amount of research between this and the Nutibullet (pro) this was cheaper and from all the reviews I read, better at doing its job. Very sturdy design, the cups are well made and have some heft to them - nothing feels cheap or poorly made. I had been using a full sized blender every morning to make my protein & breakfast shakes, the large size cup that the Ninja comes with is perfect for this purpose and everything blends way smoother and way faster than my blender ever did. I haven't tried using it to make any juice smoothies but can't see any evidence that it would fail in that area.
customer_reviews.author: Acebmg

customer_reviews.title: Better than using my full-sized Ninja blender when it comes to smoothies and shakes.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my morning green smoothies and after the gym protein shakes. Gets every bit of whatever you put in there all ground up so no chunky bits of fruit or stems from greens left behind. Only takes about 30 seconds for a super liquid smoothie that is easily drinkable. Highly recommend. Better than using my full-sized Ninja blender when it comes to smoothies and shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good Power but Super Loud
customer_reviews.text: It's powerful, very powerful and very fast. Everything I blend comes out completely smooth in less thank minute. However--and this has been a bit of a disappointment--it is VERY loud. Like, objectively speaking loud, even my boyfriend thought it was surprisingly loud from the other end of the house!! I used his Nutribullet and found it as effective, but much quieter. About to trade my new Ninja, for his old bullet!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Loud mechanical noise when active, grinding gears?
customer_reviews.text: It grinds up ice very well and has been great for making smoothies. My only complaint is that makes a really loud jarring noise when it is activated, almost like grinding gears. I think my unit might be defective because the noise sounds very unnatural.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Worked for only 3 1/2 months !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in July 2017 and it worked wonderfully! This Nov 2017 it just completely stopped working. I purchased it for a much lower price than what it's being sold for now. I sent a message to the seller to advised me to contact the manufacturer. I'm really disappointed with counting on the reliability of this product . I only made smoothies twice a week since the purchase. My $20 blender worked better than this and never went out . I will not buy this model again.
customer_reviews.author: alexisgirl69

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after two years
customer_reviews.text: The product has stopped working after two years. I noticed the lid/motor would start smoking every time I would start to blend a smoothie. I was inhaling the smoke put off by this machine. In the trash it goes. Definitely not made for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: m.green

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love mine and bought this one as a gift. Doesn't take up a lot of space, is easy to use, does a good job, and is super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: L. Grimm

customer_reviews.title: I've been juicing forever but was never satisfied with juicing greens
customer_reviews.text: I've been juicing forever but was never satisfied with juicing greens. The Ninja does a wonderful job and I can drink my salad while I'm finishing off the oatmeal. It has plenty of power and is delightfully easy to clean. I have recommended this to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jerryk

customer_reviews.title: ... my Ninja daily for green drinks and it works great. The only bummer is
customer_reviews.text: I use my Ninja daily for green drinks and it works great. The only bummer is, you have to hold and push down on the blender for it to work. It doesn't blend on its own - which is very annoying for people who want to multi-task while their drink is blending!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product for the price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. I own a Vitamix but wanted something I could keep at work. Got this over a Nutri Bullet after researching online. This works well for my needs. I use daily. Made about 40 Smoothies so far and it's going strong. I also got the warranty since I knew I would be using it a ton - well worth it in my opinion for the peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: SuperSkerple

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little blender.....
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful. Loud but I don't care if it works well. This little thing can handle anything you put in it. Just leave enough space at the top to blend. I use this in addition to my Breville Juicer. I bought this blender used on Amazon Deals. Well worth the investment! Works great and Very easy to clean! Absolutely would recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: luv2shop

customer_reviews.title: In love with my blender!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this blender for almost two months now. Every time I pass it in the kitchen I think to myself "man, I'm so happy I went with this one [blender brand/model]"! I don't use it everyday but when I do I fall in love all over again. A very happy owner.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie R

customer_reviews.title: Dynamite comes in small packages.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little sucker! I keep it at work and make smoothies with it four days a week. It makes a milkshake consistency really easily (I work in a hospital that has an industrial crushed ice machine). It sometimes gets a "smell" if I let it spin too long, but it's still cranking out the smoothies with no problem yet...
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: What a nice blender
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful blender. I use it to make smoothies all the time. Easy to clean. I normally just run the blade part under water right after blending. The to-go cup is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Wenni

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, could be better
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but I would take the nutribullet. I had a hard time choosing between the two and I regret it. It does work well and provides a nice quality drink, but I mostly don't like that this doesn't lock in, so you have to hold it down the whole time it's blending/chopping/pureeing/etc. It also screws on awkwardly so you tend to get a little spill.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: I like that it comes with small and large blending cups
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty and well functioning blender. I like that it comes with small and large blending cups. We make a lot of smoothies - this unit has no trouble turning ice instantly into slush.
customer_reviews.author: dexd33

customer_reviews.title: Good for a year
customer_reviews.text: So after a little over a year this mixer is starting to die on me.. It's been sitting for about 7 months, but it was already starting to mess up back then. It's still working, but I have to press it really hard down... and back and forth to the sides for it to start; and even then it's barely working. What to get next??
customer_reviews.author: Karl Pettersen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in my family loves this product. Easy to use and clean. Very powerful too. The only thing I would change is the size of the container. I wish it was larger. I wanted to buy some additional containers (it comes with two but since we drink out of them I wanted two more) but they are very pricey. Other than that we love this product and I even got my son to make his own smoothies now (and he refuses to bother if anything is too complicated and messy),It's a miracle!
customer_reviews.author: anna smith

customer_reviews.title: Ninja Time
customer_reviews.text: This blender works great, although it's not the most powerful I knew that I only needed it to make smoothies for me and it did a great job at that. Would Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tonny The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but could be a bit better
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and fast - wish you didn't have to hold it down to get the motor to engage. Lids can be a little tricky to get screwed on properly and if you get it off, even a tiny bit, it will leak all over you.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Gal

customer_reviews.title: great accessories but useless motor/blades
customer_reviews.text: Even with the high wattage, this one doesnt work even remotely as well as some of the other ones on the market. I would recommend going with a higher wattage if you are buying a nutri ninja. besides that problem, the rest was great, cups and sipping lids were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Alam

customer_reviews.title: Great smoothie maker
customer_reviews.text: This little machine makes great smoothies and makes short work of liquefying the ingredients. It has a lot of power for its size. I have found it works best when pulsed a few times until the ingredients are chopped and then pressing continuously to liquefy. This is a great little machine.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little blender for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my Vitamix Blender because it is a powerful machine but more importantly it is a snap to clean up. I've purchased a lot of blenders such as the Magic Bullet and this one is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Evans

customer_reviews.title: great smoothie maker
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of pureeing the kale, spinach, chard, fruits into a smooth drink. You do have to push to pulse and it takes about a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma Mary

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo happy with my NutriNinja! I really wanted a blender that I could easily make green smoothies with, and this is perfect! I absolutely love how easy it is to just pop the cup off and take it to go! It is all also really easy to clean, which was an important feature for me. I'm so glad I went by the awesome reviews. Crushes ice with ease and everything gets evenly blended every time. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Poythress

customer_reviews.title: A little loud but VERY powerful.
customer_reviews.text: This thing has plenty of power to bust up just about anything you'd want to consume. Blends to a very fine texture if you leave it on for a few seconds more. Reason for 4 star is the noise. I understand blenders aren't going to be super quiet but I literally plug my ears when I use it lol.
customer_reviews.author: Zaphod

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE great price
customer_reviews.text: i have to say I researched the heard the gasket comes off into the glass. When I researched the Ninja it was A+ as soon as it arrived I opened it up and used it. LOVE LOVE LOVE great price, crushes ice, nuts and exceeds the expectations of smoothies. very pleased I purchased
customer_reviews.author: LisaMarie

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product I own
customer_reviews.text: I cannot function without my Nutri Ninja! I make iced coffee in the morning and my shake for dinner. This is the best product I own, hands down I couldn't live without it! I bought one for my mom too and now she is addicted as well!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love our Ninja! We use it daily and after a year or two of use it finally needed a new screw on lid with blade. Called company and they were suppose to be sending me out a new one top with blade, but instead got a whole new unit for a very minimal amount.Very happy with service!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Bouslog

customer_reviews.title: Awesome powerful blender!
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful blender! I love making shakes and smoothies! The two included cups are of great quality and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tony :)

customer_reviews.title: The Nutri Ninja Pro is superior in every way and creates smoothies/drinks much
customer_reviews.text: Many people have told me a regular blender would function just as well as the Nutri Ninja Pro. However, I have found this not to be true. The Nutri Ninja Pro is superior in every way and creates smoothies/drinks much, much better. Well worth the investment !
customer_reviews.author: budgemes

customer_reviews.title: Great Nutra Ninja Pro
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with this powerful machine! We make smoothies every day. This is a fast, efficient gadget. I was going to purchase a simple blender but after reading the reviews for the Nutra Ninja Pro I changed my mind. So glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: JudiPen

customer_reviews.title: I love the power behind the Nutri Ninja Pro
customer_reviews.text: I love the power behind the Nutri Ninja Pro. It handles fresh or frozen items quickly and blends them to a smooth consistency. The only drawback is the fact that you must manually push down on the container and maintain pressure in order for the motor to activate. I would have liked to be able to attach the container and have an automatic function to get the motor going.
customer_reviews.author: GeriL

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend and re-purchase as a gift for friends and family
customer_reviews.text: As described and expected. I would recommend and re-purchase as a gift for friends and family. Thought about getting Nutri Bullet, but decided to go with Ninja based on reviews and previous quality products I have had experiences with from the Ninja family.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I've had my blender for a month now and it has treated me well. It lets me add just the right amount for a single person serving, it's great so I don't go overboard. It's pretty loud so keep that in mind, but that's a given. I have nothing bad to say about it, it's easy to use, easy to clean, and super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Bullet! This is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Much better than what I had before, which was the Bullet. The only downside is that you have to hold it down for it to blend. I'm thinking a weight will do the trick. The smoothie is done twice as fast as the Bullet too.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Crousey

customer_reviews.title: Ninja products are good for the short time that they work
customer_reviews.text: Ninja products are good for the short time that they work . The blade housing bushings fail too quickly . I bought the top model . In the 14 months I used it . I went through 3 blade housings and 2 power bases . Before you invest in this product , think a little harder about investing in the one that too many businesses use . You are worth it !
customer_reviews.author: Donald F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful. We use it for both yogurt/oats/protein and ice/yogurt/frozen fruit without any hassel.
customer_reviews.author: purplesoccer1

customer_reviews.title: ... using the unit for a few months now and love it. Size and function is perfect for making ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the unit for a few months now and love it. Size and function is perfect for making a smoothie every morning.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Veenkant

customer_reviews.title: In Love
customer_reviews.text: I haven't loved a product this much since my dysphasia vacuum. It makes excellent protein shakes that taste delicious. I will say it's loud, but that doesn't bother me since it liquifies extremely fast. Now that I have shakes every day I feel more energized and healthy. This comes highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sara J. Burris

customer_reviews.title: Blades jammed after only a couple months of use and Nutri will not replace under warranty
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a couple months of regular use (5-7 times a week) - blades stuck, smoked, and sputtered. When I called NInja to claim the warranty and request a replacement, they told me the warranty only covered the base of the unit. As it was the blades that had become jammed in place, they would not replace the unit. Do not buy this product or purchase from this manufacturer, who will not stand behind all the parts of their product.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Lytle

customer_reviews.title: The Ninja is amazing! I've had it for a few months and ...
customer_reviews.text: The Ninja is amazing! I've had it for a few months and use it almost daily! It's powerful enough to get through ice cubes, frozen banana, and other fruits in a matter of seconds. My favorite aspect of this product is the blade is super easy to clean! My old blender took time to scrub after each use, whereas the Ninja can be simply rinsed off and dried for the next use. I am SO happy with the product and recommended it to several friends who also love it! Although I've never owned a NutriBullet, I have had friends who say the motor doesn't last/lacks power.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This product works great! It crushes ice and mixes, blends and pulverizes everything I put in there.
customer_reviews.author: jmr120

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product, if the caps were better
customer_reviews.text: I love my Ninja so much. I was choosing between this and the Magic Bullet, and I'm so glad I bought this. The motor is extremely strong, and blends perfectly. The only problem I have is that the travel lids are hard to clean on the sides, and the threading of the cup is on the inside. It takes a couple of tries to screw on.
customer_reviews.author: Dat_Contributor27

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for a very good quality blender. Works perfectly for my morning smoothies and shakes. I blend fruit, greens, yogurt and ice for fruit smoothies. It even tackles large frozen espresso cubes for my protein shakes. Quick, easy cleanup as well.
customer_reviews.author: Danelle

customer_reviews.title: Good Machine
customer_reviews.text: Powerful machine. Cups are made from good quality plastic. To place lid (with chopper) onto cup is a little bit tricky or it may leak. Once learned the trick, all works well.
customer_reviews.author: Sunmoon

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies, difficult to clean base
customer_reviews.text: Love my ninja! It works wonderfully for smoothies with enough liquid. The cup itself is easily to clean however, I find the inner workings of the base are difficult to clean. Liquid from the cup often leaks out of the top into several crevices within the base.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Very cumbersome to use. Not easy to start. You need to hold the canister on with your hands in order to keep the motor engaged. Flimsy construction. Owned a Nutri-Bullet prior to this and wish I purchased another one of those instead.
customer_reviews.author: KGMN

customer_reviews.title: Good for healthy smoothie drinks
customer_reviews.text: Like this product a lot. Only thing is you can't make like real 'juice' with it - it's more like smoothies only. But it is still great and easy to use and clean. Includes some nice recipes too
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blends smooth and quick
customer_reviews.text: Just tried it today and love it. The 24 oz container gave some extra room for all my ingredients - I made a protein drink with protein powder, half an avocado, blueberries, a banana, walnuts, cocoa powder, fro you and soy milk - it blended perfectly in about a minute. Good to pulse though.
customer_reviews.author: Occy Joe

customer_reviews.title: I have owned juicers and eventually stopped using them as there is so much clean up and waste involved. I have used this every d
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, powerful machine. I have owned juicers and eventually stopped using them as there is so much clean up and waste involved. I have used this every day for almost 2 months. Clean up is a breeze and I like that nothing goes to waste! Awesome product and we'll worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: tatonkaman

customer_reviews.title: but I think this one works much better! (at least for my purposes)
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVEEE this! I own the full size Ninja blender, but I think this one works much better! (at least for my purposes). I make smoothies and shakes daily, and it blends frozen fruit/ice/veggies in NO TIME. It's absolutely fabulous and I can't live without it!!! It's so convenient to have my drinks made in the to-go cups - makes the clean up process a million times easier than with the full size blender. MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Breen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Extra $ for Power
customer_reviews.text: Use every day for breakfast smoothies. Do NOT fill over max line because it'll leak a bit. Power is great, liquifies frozen fruits quickly. A bit loud but that's to be expected. Wish it came with more cups/accessories.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I opted to buy the ninja blender for my mom because I have a Neutra bullet magic bullet that is leaking after just a few years of mild use. This one is as easy as the other just fill the cup and twist it on the base. So far, my 75 yo mother loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicster PT

product_meta.title: Nutri Ninja Pro BL450 (Discontinued)
product_meta.description: Power - 900 Watts Speeds - Pulse Technology Nutrient and Vitamin Extraction Nutri Ninja Cup Capacity - (1) 18 oz. and (1) 24 oz. - 1 Year BPA Free Dishwasher Safe
feature_bullets: Ninja Pro Extractor Blades crush through ice, seeds, skins and stems for a smooth, even consistency
Frozen Blending, crush through ice and frozen fruit for cold, healthy drinks and smoothies
#1 Most Powerful Nutrient and Vitamin Extraction
18 oz. and 24 oz. to go cups, sip and seal lids, 30 recipe and wellness guide

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,723 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
